mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.NAME, a.age, a.sex, a.telephone, a.address, a.log_time, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT ( c.chinese_name ) ) AS care_name, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT ( e.role_name ) ) AS role_name, a.head_portrait FROM common_user a left join common_user_care_varieties_r b on a.id = b.user_id left join km_variety_encyclopedia c on b.variety_code = c.id left join common_user_role_rel d on a.id = d.user_id left join common_role e on d.role_id = e.id where a.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update common_user set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select IFNULL(count(1),0) as fans from common_follow where object_id = #{id}
select IFNULL(count(1),0) as care from common_follow where follow_user_id = #{id}
select IFNULL(count(1),0) as supply from mall_supply where state ='0' and seller_id = #{id}
select IFNULL(count(1),0) as purchase from mall_purchase where state ='1' and user_id = #{id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.id AS user_id, a.NAME, IFNULL( GROUP_CONCAT( c.role_name ORDER BY c.role_name DESC ), '' ) AS a_role, a.telephone, '' AS coop, '' AS HELP, '' AS integral, '' AS supply, '' AS purchase, STATUS FROM common_user a LEFT JOIN common_user_role_rel b ON a.id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN common_role c ON b.role_id = c.id where 1 = 1
and a.telephone LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{tel}, '%' )
AND str_to_date(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d') < log_time
AND str_to_date(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d') > log_time
GROUP BY a.id ) AS temp WHERE 1 = 1
AND a_role LIKE CONCAT( '%', #{role}, '%' )
ORDER BY user_id
select IFNULL(a.user_id,'') AS user_id , b.name , a.assistant from field_coop_member a left join field_coop b on a.coop_id = b.id
select seller_id as user_id,count(1) as supply from mall_supply where state = '0' and is_audit = '1' and carriage_status = '1' GROUP BY (seller_id)
select user_id,count(1) as purchase from mall_purchase where state = '1' and is_aduit = '1' group by user_id

SELECT id,head_portrait,name,sex,age,address,telephone, CASE WHEN LOCATE(5,GROUP_CONCAT(B.role_id))=0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as isSpc, CASE WHEN LOCATE(1,GROUP_CONCAT(B.role_id))=0 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END as isPlant FROM common_user A , common_user_role_rel B
WHERE id= #{userID} AND A.id=B.user_id
SELECT interact_count, active_count FROM spec_interact_stats WHERE spec_id = #{userId}

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(variety_name) as loveMedicineName, GROUP_CONCAT(ccr.variety_code) as loveMedicineID FROM common_user_care_varieties_r ccr LEFT JOIN common_medicine_variety cv ON ccr.variety_code = cv.variety_code WHERE ccr.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM common_user_role_rel WHERE user_id= #{userID} AND role_id=1
